paragraphs.body: I think we should revise the categories that are in the category Index, and split them up into two sub-main categories to Avatar Wiki and Avatar: The Last Airbender. Then we could sort the remaining extra files in there to either of the two categories. It would clean up all the mess of the categories, and help it be organized. Indexes are suppose to be clean cut, so it would benefit it. Any thoughts? Joey - Talk Contribs 06:09, 24 January 2009 (UTC)
